{{Description|A tabletop card dueling game that is all the rage in Teyvat. Join as a "Genius Invokation TCG" player, collect cards, build your deck... and go toe-to-toe with various opponents at the table!|[https://act.hoyoverse.com/ys/event/e20221207-card-dhcksn/index.html Official Website]}}
'''Genius Invokation TCG''' is a permanent game mode introduced in [[Version 3.3]].

Players can unlock the tutorial quest ''[[Come Try Genius Invokation TCG!]]'' by reaching [[Adventure Rank]] 32 and completing [[Archon Quest]] [[Prologue]]: Act III - [[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]].

==Gameplay==
Players can invite [[character]]s and [[NPC]]s to play against in PvE. Players can play against friends, but there are no rewards for PvP.

For in-depth description of the rules, see [[Genius Invokation TCG/Rules]].

==[[File:Icon Deck List.png|30px|link=]] Cards==
There are two groups of cards, Character Cards and Action Cards. They can be obtained from the [[Genius Invokation TCG/Card Shop|Card Shop]], completing challenges in duels, and increasing Player Level.

A total of {{formatnum:{{Genius Invokation TCG Rewards|item=Lucky Coin|not1=Weekly Guest Challenge Stages}}}} [[Lucky Coin]]s can be obtained from stages, excluding Weekly Guest Challenges, with an additional 23,600 Lucky Coins obtainable from the [[TCG Player's Manual]] Match Rewards and 500 from [[#Level Rewards|Player Level]] Rewards.

===[[File:Icon Character Card.png|30px|link=]] Character Cards===
{{Main|Character Card}}
Character Cards have three types of abilities that can be used: Normal Attack, Elemental Skill, and Elemental Burst. Some cards may have multiple Normal Attacks or Elemental Skills.

Character Cards based on [[Playable Characters]] can be obtained by achieving victory in the Friendly Fracas difficulty of [[Genius Invokation TCG/Invitational|Invitationals]]. [[Genius Invokation TCG/Stage/Diluc|Diluc]], [[Genius Invokation TCG/Stage/Kaeya|Kaeya]], [[Genius Invokation TCG/Stage/Sucrose|Sucrose]], and [[Genius Invokation TCG/Stage/Fischl|Fischl]] can be obtained during the tutorial quest ''[[Come Try Genius Invokation TCG!]]''.

Character Cards based on certain [[Enemies]] can be obtained by achieving victory on the Friendly Fracas difficulty of [[Genius Invokation TCG/Stage#Tavern Challenges|Tavern Challenges]].

===[[File:Icon Action Card.png|30px|link=]] Action Cards===
{{Main|Action Card}}
There are 3 types of Action Cards, each with different effects:
* [[Equipment Card]]s are equipped on character to apply an effect that buffs the character.
** [[Weapon Card]]s are based on [[Weapon]]s.
** [[Artifact Card]]s are based on [[Artifact]]s and [[Artifact Sets]].
** [[Talent Card]]s are based on [[Character]] [[Talent]]s and [[Constellation]]s.
* [[Event Card]]s will immediately trigger a one-time effect when played.
** [[Elemental Resonance Card]]s provide effects based on having two Character Cards of the same element in the deck.
** [[Food Card]]s give buffs to the character that eats the food.
** No Group Cards provide effects not in the above groups.
* [[Support Card]]s can placed in the Support Zone to continuously apply supporting effects.
** [[Companion Card]]s are based on [[NPC]]s.
** [[Item Card]]s are based on [[Item]]s.
** [[Location Card]]s are based on [[Location]]s.
** No Group Cards provide effects not in the above groups.

==[[File:Item Player EXP.png|30px|link=]] Player Level==
Players can play Genius Invokation TCG to earn [[Player EXP]] to increase their Player Level.

Some Player Levels require completing the [[Ascension Challenge]] to level up once the require EXP is obtained.

A total of {{formatnum:{{Genius Invokation TCG Rewards|item=Player EXP|not1=Weekly Guest Challenge Stages}}}} Player EXP can be obtained from stages, excluding Weekly Guest Challenges.

==[[File:Icon TCG Player's Manual.png|30px|link=]] TCG Player's Manual==
{{Main|TCG Player's Manual}}
The TCG Player's Manual contains quest to earn rewards.

==[[File:Icon TCG Stage.png|30px|link=]] Stages==
{{Main|Genius Invokation TCG/Stage}}
===Open World Matches===
Use the [[Casket of Tomes]] to find players on the [[map]]. There are two difficulties, Adventure Challenges and Duels. Complete to earn Player EXP and cards.

===Weekly Guest Challenges===
Each week, a maximum of 4 guests will visit The Cat's Tail. 1 will appear daily, but after reaching level 4, they will all appear on Monday. Defeat them in duels to obtain Player EXP.

Due to all guest arriving on Monday at Player Level 4 and up, if it is not Sunday, the rewards for completing the guest challenges no longer change the day after the player increases their Player Level between guest challenge days as available challenges do not change.

Some opponents in Weekly Guest Challenges will change their decks based on the player's Player Level, such modifying the Active Character Cards Lineup, modifying the Reserve Lineup, or modifying the Action Cards.

{{Genius Invokation TCG Weekly Rewards}}

===Tavern Challenges===
Tavern Challenges are tests of mastery received at The Cat's Tail. There are Friendly Fracas and Serious Showdown difficulties. Complete the challenge objectives to earn Character and Talent Cards.

==[[File: Icon Invitation Board.png|30px|link=]] Invitation Board==
{{Main|Genius Invokation TCG/Invitational}}
Players can access the Invitation Board to invite characters through the Player List or match with other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Heated Battle Mode==
<!--{{Main|Genius Invokation TCG/Heated Battle Mode}}-->
Heated Battle Mode is available for a limited time available on a regular basis each [[Version]]. Each version will have a special rules that may lead to a completely different experience from the usual gameplay of Genius Invokation TCG.

Heated Battle Mode can be accessed at the Invitation Board of The Cat's Tail once the player has reached Played Level 4.
